3.117. 
Shares in the matrimonial community property 
1. It shall be presumed that the spouses' shares of the common property are equal. 
2. The principle of equal shares of the spouses' community property may be derogated from only in the cases provided for in this Code. 
3. If the value of the property awarded to a spouse exceeds his or her share of the community property, that spouse shall be obliged to pay compensation to the other spouse. The court may postpone the payment of the compensation for a maximum period of two years on the presentation of adequate security for the fulfilment of this obligation. 
4. In the event of the death of one of the spouses, his/her share of the community property shall be inherited in accordance with the rules laid down in the fifth book of this Code.
